name: Jump Off
description:
Tired of using your legs and arms to jump rope? Now all you need is one finger! "Jump Off" is jump rope for you finger.

This game and the other games I make are powered by the crowdfunding website Patreon. If you enjoy the game, please consider visiting my Patreon page, rating the game, and checking out other games I create.

Follow me on Twitter - https://twitter.com/ericnbrill
Support me on Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/ericnbrill

Some Free Image Sources I used that have asked to be credited.

Brick: http://www.freepik.com/free-vector/colorful-brick-wall-texture_957410.htm

Star: http://www.freepik.com/free-vector/colorful-star-icons_787040.htm

Rope: http://www.freepik.com/free-vector/ropes-in-spiral-forms_714054.htm
